translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

By virtue of the provision in article 44 of the instructions for the elections of deputies to the Constituent Assembly, councilmen, and justices of the peace of the State, may Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Treasury Secretariat in Caçapava, February 13, 1840. Manuel Martins da Silveira Lemos. To the citizen Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu, Collector of Boqueirão.

Copy attached to Doc. CV-86
